name: Featherfall Judgment
title: Cyno: Featherfall Judgment
inPlayDescription: When your Cyno, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer while having an even number of levels of <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Pactsworn Pathclearer's Indwelling effect, deal +1 DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Cyno to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Cyno, equip this card.After Cyno equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer once.When your Cyno, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer while having an even number of level of <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Pactsworn Pathclearer's Indwelling effect, deal +1 DMG.(You must have Cyno in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
